greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of vertices in the regular 4-dimensional polytopes.
reference: H. S. M. Coxeter, Regular Polytopes, 3rd ed., Dover, NY, 1973.
example: a(2) = 16 since a 4D hypercube contains sixteen vertices.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 15 2001
